entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 2:52 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
